title: Monospaced Serif
content:
Typeface used throughout Thomas Ruff 'Lichten' book. Been looking for something similar for ages!  
Appreciate any help.  
For the book: http://www.ideabooks.nl/9789491843174-thomas-ruff-lichten

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192619im_/http:/typophile.com/files/monospaced_3462.gif)
